# Projects

## 📊 Risk Modeling for Insurance

Developed machine learning models for risk assessment and pricing in the insurance sector, helping improve underwriting decisions and profitability.

## 🔍 Image Compression Research

Research focused on dimensionality reduction and image compression using Principal Component Analysis (PCA) and Discrete Cosine Transform (DCT). Developed efficient approximate transforms for signal processing.
